parts.text: You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
When does Summer 2025 registration start at LIU?
Summer 2025 registration at LIU starts on May 10, 2025 at 10:00 am.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the date and time for Pre-Fall 2025 registration at LIU?
Pre-Fall 2025 registration begins on May 16, 2025 at 10:00 am.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How is tuition calculated at LIU?
LIU calculates tuition fees based on the number of credits. Additional costs like social security, registration, and books are not included in the credit price.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How many credits are needed to finish the freshman program at LIU?
Students must complete at least 30 credits in Freshman Arts, Sciences, or Engineering to finish the freshman program at LIU.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Where are LIU's campuses located?
LIU has campuses in Beirut, Bekaa, Saida, Nabatieh, Tripoli, Mount Lebanon, Tyre, Rayak, and Akkar, as well as international campuses in Yemen, Senegal, and Mauritania.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How can I apply to LIU?
Students can apply to LIU online at www.liuserver.net or in person at the admission office. Applications must be complete with all required documents, which become the property of LIU.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Are my admission documents returned to me at LIU?
No, all applications and official documents submitted to LIU remain the property of the university and will be kept confidential.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the structure of courses at LIU?
Courses at LIU are structured as modules covering subject matter, with scheduled instructional time, and often include labs, fieldwork, research, and homework.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Do all courses at LIU include practical components?
Yes, many courses at LIU include laboratory work, field exercises, homework, and research time for hands-on practice.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is meant by curriculum at LIU?
At LIU, curriculum refers to both a set of courses in a program and the detailed academic content taught in each course, including lessons, materials, assessments, and learning goals.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How do scholars define curriculum at LIU?
John Dewey defines curriculum as a continuous reconstruction of experience, while Ralph Tyler sees it as all planned learning experiences to meet educational goals.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is a credit hour at LIU?
A credit hour equals 15 hours of teaching per semester. For labs, one credit is 30 hours. A 3-credit course equals 45 hours of attendance. Graduation requires a specific number of credits.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are major courses at LIU?
Major courses focus on application and essential skills tied to a program's objectives. They reflect the core competencies required for graduation.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are technical electives at LIU?
Technical electives are chosen based on relevance to the major and can sometimes be selected from related programs in different schools if they support learning outcomes.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are core courses at LIU?
Core courses are required foundational subjects that prepare students for advanced study. They usually act as prerequisites for major courses.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the purpose of General Education at LIU?
General Education at LIU develops communication, critical thinking, and interdisciplinary skills. It forms the foundation of every undergraduate program.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What subjects are included in LIU's General Education program?
LIU'ss General Education includes Communication Skills, Humanities, Social Sciences, Arts, Scientific Inquiry, Discovery, and Quantitative Reasoning.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is LIU's philosophy behind financial aid?
LIU believes in 'Education for All' and offers financial aid to ensure that no student is denied access to higher education due to financial limitations.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Who is eligible for financial aid at LIU?

Financial aid at LIU is available to qualified students who demonstrate financial need, meet credit enrollment requirements, and maintain academic progress. Students in the School of Pharmacy (SoPH) are not eligible.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the academic requirements to keep financial aid at LIU?
Students must maintain a cumulative GPA of at least 70% after 30 credits and pass 67% of attempted credits to continue receiving financial aid.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What makes a student ineligible for financial aid at LIU?
Students become ineligible if they receive another scholarship covering 50% or more of tuition, benefit from a scholarship, or register for fewer credits than the program minimum.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How do students apply for financial aid at LIU?

Students can apply for financial aid by obtaining a form from the Student Affairs Office, scheduling an interview with a Financial Aid Officer, and submitting the required documents before the deadline.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Do students need to renew their financial aid at LIU?
Yes, financial aid must be renewed every academic year by submitting a Renewal Form before the official deadline.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How are tuition fees calculated at LIU?
LIU calculates tuition based on the number of credits. Additional fees like social security, registration, and books are not included in the credit cost.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Can LIU change its tuition fees without notice?
Yes, LIU reserves the right to change tuition fees and charges without prior notice.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Where can LIU students pay their fees?
Students can pay their fees at IBL, FNB, Credit Libanais, Fransabank, and OMT.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Is there a penalty for late tuition payment at LIU?
Students who fail to pay tuition on time are subject to a penalty of LBP 350,000 and USD 10.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Are Pharmacy students eligible for financial aid at LIU?
No, students in the School of Pharmacy are not eligible for financial aid due to its specialized tuition plan.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How do I apply for financial aid at LIU?
To apply for financial aid, students must visit the business office, fill out a form, and provide information about their financial background. Applications are reviewed by a board.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Are university fees at LIU refundable?
All university funds are non-refundable at LIU. However, tuition may be partially refunded under specific conditions.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is LIU's tuition refund policy during drop/add period?
If a student drops courses during the drop/add period, 100% of the tuition is refunded. After that, tuition is not refunded unless a petition is approved.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the transfer program at LIU?
LIU offers transfer and study abroad programs that expose students to new cultures and academic experiences. Students from other universities are welcome to transfer to LIU.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Will LIU accept my previous university credits?
LIU reviews all transfer student transcripts to determine which courses are eligible for transfer toward the student's chosen program.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What documents are needed to transfer to LIU?

Required documents include a certified copy of the Baccalaureate degree, university transcript and course descriptions, ID, family civil status record, passport photo, social security documents or $135 fee, $30 application fee, and $20 for the English exam.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Can transfer students apply for financial aid at LIU?
Yes, transfer students can apply for financial aid by picking up an application form from the Public Relations Office.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How do I apply to LIU as a transfer student?
Students can apply online at www.liuserver.net or directly at the admission office with assistance. All documents must be submitted to complete the file.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Are my application documents returned after applying to LIU?
No, all applications and submitted documents remain the property of LIU and are kept confidential.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the mission of the School of Education at LIU?

The School of Education at LIU aims to improve teaching and learning by conducting research, offering high-quality programs, collaborating with educators, and promoting diversity in staff and curriculum.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the vision of the School of Education at LIU?
LIU's School of Education aspires to promote learner-centered academic excellence, support lifelong learners, and foster innovation in digital education while contributing to the community.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
When was the School of Education established at LIU?
The School of Education at LIU was officially established in 2002 in collaboration with the Ministry of Education.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What types of programs are offered by the School of Education?
Yes, the School of Education offers 5 undergraduate and 3 graduate programs, including teacher education, training, and professional development.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Is the School of Education involved in research?
Yes, the school is involved in national and international research partnerships, including ERASMUS+ and H2020, with active projects in several European countries.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the graduation requirements for a BA in Education at LIU?
To earn a BA from LIU's School of Education, students must complete 99 credits: 24 in General Education, 42 in Teaching Area Requirements, and 33 in Teacher Education Core.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the duration of an undergraduate education degree at LIU?
The undergraduate education program at LIU usually takes 3 years to complete.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the admission requirements for undergraduate studies at LIU?

You must submit a certified copy of your Baccalaureate degree, English test score or take LIU's placement test, ID, civil status record, passport photo, social security documents or $135, and pay a $30 application fee and $20 per entrance exam.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How long is the graduate education program at LIU?
The graduate education program at LIU typically lasts for 2 years.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What documents are needed for graduate admission at LIU?

You need to provide a certified Baccalaureate degree, university degree and transcript, ID, civil status record, photo, social security documents or $135, $50 application fee, and $20 for the English entrance exam.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
If I studied at LIU, how do I apply for graduate studies?
Current LIU students must visit the admissions office, fill out an application form, and pay a $50 non-refundable application fee.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Does LIU accept transfer students?
Yes, LIU welcomes transfer students from around the world and offers credit evaluation for previously completed coursework.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What documents are required for transfer admission to LIU?

Transfer applicants must submit a certified Baccalaureate degree, university transcript and course description, ID, civil status record, photo, social security papers or $135, $30 application fee, and $20 per entrance exam.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is special about the School of Business at LIU?

The School of Business at LIU has grown rapidly in the last five years and offers modern, practical curricula that prepare students for the Lebanese and regional job markets with strong ethical and citizenship values.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How many students and programs are offered in the School of Business?
LIU's School of Business has over 10,000 students and offers eight undergraduate business majors and an MBA program with eight different emphases.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Who teaches in the School of Business at LIU?
The faculty at LIU's School of Business includes experienced educators and working professionals who support teaching and curriculum delivery.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the vision of LIU's School of Business?
The School of Business at LIU aims to develop future business leaders who impact policy, practice, and society.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the mission of the School of Business at LIU?
Its mission is to provide students with career-focused education, critical thinking, ethics, and global awareness through high-quality curricula aligned with modern business trends.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the graduation requirements for a bachelor's in business at LIU?
Students must complete 99 credits: 24 in General Education, 42 in Core Business, and 33 in Major courses with at least a 2.0 GPA.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How many credits are needed to complete an MBA at LIU?
MBA students must complete 39 credits, including 21 core, 12 major required, and 6 major elective credits, all at the 500-level or above.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How long is the undergraduate business program at LIU?
The undergraduate Business program at LIU usually lasts 3 years.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the admission requirements for undergraduate business at LIU?

To apply for an undergraduate Business degree at LIU, submit a certified Baccalaureate degree, English test score or take the LIU English Placement Test, ID, civil status record, passport photo, social security documents or $135, and pay a $30 application fee and $20 per entrance exam.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How long is the MBA program at LIU?
Graduate Business degrees at LIU, including the MBA, usually take 2 years to complete.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What documents are required for applying to LIU's graduate Business programs?

Applicants must submit a certified Baccalaureate degree, university degree and transcript, ID, civil status record, passport photo, social security documents or $135, $50 application fee, and $20 for the English entrance exam.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How can a current LIU student apply to the graduate Business program?
Current LIU students must visit the admissions office, fill out the application form, and pay the $50 non-refundable application fee.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Does LIU accept transfer students into the Business program?
Yes, LIU welcomes transfer students globally and reviews transcripts to determine eligible transferable credits into the Business program.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the document requirements for Business transfer students at LIU?

Transfer applicants must submit a certified Baccalaureate degree, university transcript with course descriptions, ID, civil status record, photo, social security papers or $135, and pay $30 application fee and $20 per entrance exam.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the mission of the School of Arts and Sciences at LIU?

The mission is to nurture intellectual ability, creativity, independence, and competitiveness through curricula, research, and student-faculty interaction, while fostering lifelong learning and social responsibility.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the vision of the School of Arts and Sciences at LIU?
The School aims to be a leading destination for transforming students into holistic beings with knowledge, conscience, and a commitment to community needs.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the credit requirements for the Freshman Program at LIU?
To complete the Freshman Program at LIU, students must complete at least 30 credits in Freshman Arts, Sciences, or Engineering.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Can a student with a Lebanese Baccalaureate enroll in the Freshman Program?
No, students who have completed the Lebanese Baccalaureate or its equivalent cannot enroll in the Freshman Program at LIU.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the SAT score requirements for LIU's Freshman Program?
Minimum combined SAT I and SAT II scores are 2600 for Freshman Arts and 2750 for Freshman Sciences.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How long is the undergraduate program in Arts and Sciences at LIU?
The undergraduate Arts and Sciences program at LIU typically lasts 3 years.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What documents are required for undergraduate Arts and Sciences admission at LIU?
Applicants need a certified Baccalaureate degree, English score or placement test, ID, civil status record, photo, social security papers or $135, and must pay $30 application and $20 exam fees.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the requirements for graduate admission in Arts and Sciences at LIU?
Graduate applicants need a certified Baccalaureate degree, university transcript, ID, civil status record, photo, social security papers or $135, and must pay $30 application and $20 exam fees.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Who are the professors in the School of Science at LIU?

The faculty members in the School of Science at LIU include:
- Dr. Rafif Hamam - Chairperson - rafif.hamam@liu.edu.lb
- Dr. Ahmad A Faraj - Associate Professor - ahmad.faraj@liu.edu.lb
- Dr. Ali Jawad Sabbah - Assistant Professor - ali.sabbah@liu.edu.lb
- Dr. Issam Hussein Kaddoura - Associate Professor - issam.kaddoura@liu.edu.lb
- Dr. Salam Sassine Sakr - Assistant Professor - salam.sakr@liu.edu.lb
- Dr. Saleh Nabhan Abdulal - Associate Professor - saleh.abdulal@liu.edu.lb
- Dr. Sami A Hammoud - Assistant Professor - sami.hammoud@liu.edu.lb
- Dr. Yahia Y Awad - Associate Professor - yehya.awad@liu.edu.lb
- Dr. Ihab Mohamad Khaled Dannawi - Assistant Professor - ihab.dannawi@liu.edu.lb
- Dr. Tarek Hussein Harb - Associate Professor - tarek.harb@liu.edu.lb
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Who assigns academic advisors at LIU?
Every student at LIU is assigned an advisor by the Dean or Chair based on the student's program upon acceptance.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
When does academic advising take place at LIU?
The academic orientation period occurs during the two weeks prior to pre-registration each semester, as listed in the academic calendar. However, students are encouraged to seek advising anytime.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are a student's responsibilities in academic advising at LIU?

Students should understand university policies, check emails regularly, plan with their advisor each semester, make their own academic decisions, and keep their advisor updated about academic progress and goals.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Can LIU students visit their advisor outside the official advising period?
Yes, students at LIU are encouraged to visit their advisor for academic advising at any time during the semester, not only during the official orientation period.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the mission of the School of Pharmacy at LIU?

The School of Pharmacy at LIU aims to develop distinguished professionals in pharmacy practice, research, and community service through a dynamic educational program aligned with national and international standards.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the vision of the School of Pharmacy at LIU?
The School of Pharmacy envisions being a socially accountable institution that advances the pharmacy profession through education, practice, research, and community outreach.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What makes the School of Pharmacy at LIU stand out?

LIU's School of Pharmacy is known for its dedicated instructors, state-of-the-art labs, high student motivation, and graduates who achieve top scores and 100% pass rates on the national colloquium exam.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What programs are offered by LIU's School of Pharmacy?
In addition to the BS in Pharmacy, LIU's School of Pharmacy now offers a Pharm D program for students holding a BS degree in Pharmacy.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How long is the undergraduate pharmacy program at LIU?
The undergraduate pharmacy program at LIU usually lasts 3 years.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
When can I apply to the undergraduate pharmacy program at LIU?
Applications for the pharmacy major are accepted once a year from May until mid-August.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the undergraduate application requirements for pharmacy at LIU?

Applicants must submit a certified Baccalaureate degree, TOEFL/IELTS score or take the LIU English Placement Test, ID, civil status record, photo, social security papers or $135, and pay $30 application and $20 exam fees.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How long is the graduate pharmacy program at LIU?
Graduate pharmacy degrees at LIU typically last 2 years.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the application requirements for graduate pharmacy studies at LIU?
Applicants must submit a certified Baccalaureate and university degree, transcript, ID, civil status record, photo, social security documents or $135, and pay $50 application and $20 exam fees.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How can current LIU students apply to graduate pharmacy programs?
Current LIU students must visit the admissions office, fill out an application form, and pay the $50 non-refundable application fee.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Does LIU accept pharmacy transfer students?
Yes, LIU welcomes pharmacy transfer students and evaluates transcripts to determine which courses are transferable.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What documents are required for transferring into the pharmacy program at LIU?

Transfer applicants must submit a certified Baccalaureate, university transcript with course descriptions, ID, civil status record, photo, social security papers or $135, and pay $30 application and $20 exam fees.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Who is the Dean of the School of Engineering at LIU?
The Dean of the School of Engineering is Prof. Amin Haj-Ali, PhD, MCITPM.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is LIU's School of Engineering known for?

LIU's School of Engineering is known for preparing graduates with strong technical, communication, and problem-solving skills who succeed globally in various industries, especially in the Gulf States.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the graduation requirements for undergraduate engineering students at LIU?
Undergraduate engineering students must complete 108 credits and have a major and cumulative GPA of at least 70% (2.0) to graduate.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the vision of LIU's School of Engineering?
The vision is to equip students with the skills to succeed as engineers, lead in their professions, and contribute responsibly to society.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What documents are required for applying to the undergraduate engineering program at LIU?

Undergraduate applicants must submit a certified Baccalaureate, TOEFL/IELTS or take the LIU English test, ID, civil status record, photo, social security papers or $135, and pay $30 application and $20 exam fees.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How do I transfer to LIU's engineering program?

Transfer applicants must submit a certified Baccalaureate, university transcript and course description, ID, civil status record, photo, social security papers or $135, and pay $30 application and $20 exam fees.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the graduation requirements for undergraduate engineering students?
To graduate from the undergraduate engineering program, students must complete 108 credits and have a major and cumulative GPA of at least 2.0 (70%).
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the admission requirements for the Freshman Engineering Program?
Applicants must submit Freshman permission from the Ministry, grades 10-12, ID, civil status record, photo, SAT I & II scores, and pay $30 application and $20 English exam fees.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the vision of LIU's Student Affairs Office?
The SAO's vision is to create a student-focused boulevard for success by enhancing learning through developmental services that support emotional, physical, and cognitive wellness.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How does the SAO help students with financial aid at LIU?
The SAO advises on financial aid opportunities, reviews eligibility, processes applications, and determines adjustments based on individual student needs.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Who can apply for financial aid at LIU?
Any new or current LIU student demonstrating financial need may apply for financial aid, except for students in the School of Pharmacy due to high operational costs.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How can I apply for financial aid at LIU?
Students must obtain an application from the SAO, schedule an interview with a Financial Aid Officer, and submit required documents before the 5th week of the semester.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What health services are offered to students at LIU?
LIU provides outpatient care, emergency medical support, preventive health services, and wellness education through the Health Services Unit on campus.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What does the Public Affairs and Communications Office at LIU do?
The PA&C Office handles public relations, media, internal and external communications, crisis management, alumni and career services, and promotes LIU's image and strategic goals.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
How does LIU stay in touch with its alumni?
LIU maintains contact with alumni through the LIU Alumni Association, which builds university loyalty and networking opportunities from the moment of graduation.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Does LIU help students find internships or jobs?
Yes, LIU shares internship and job opportunities for students and alumni, and offers career services to assist with resumes, cover letters, and job placement.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What does the QAIEA Office do at LIU?
The QAIEA Office ensures continuous review of educational and research quality, supports institutional and program accreditation, and promotes academic excellence across all levels at LIU.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
Which accreditations does LIU currently hold?
LIU is recognized by MEHE, accredited institutionally by HCERES, and has program accreditation from ACPE for Pharmacy and candidacy status from ACBSP for the School of Business.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What model does QAIEA use for accreditation readiness?
QAIEA uses a comprehensive self-examination model to meet national and international accreditation standards at institutional, school, and program levels.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What was the IACQA 2018 conference hosted by LIU?

The IACQA 2018 conference, hosted at LIU Bekaa Campus, gathered over 350 attendees and featured more than 115 presentations addressing quality assurance mechanisms, governance, and accreditation in higher education.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the purpose of the Office of International Relations at LIU?
The OIR develops and coordinates LIU's international activities including student and staff mobility, partnerships, exchange programs, funding, and international educational agreements.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What support does the International Relations Office provide to international students?
The OIR helps international students with admissions, legal status, exchange programs, scholarships, and study abroad logistics.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What does the Admission and Registration Office at LIU do?

The Admission and Registration Office handles student admissions, course registrations, academic record keeping, transcript evaluations, and graduation certification in compliance with MEHE and university policies.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What services does the Registration Unit provide at LIU?
The Registration Unit assists with course registration, transcript evaluation, academic record management, graduation certification, and supports enrollment with accurate student data.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What is the role of CERGS at the Lebanese International University?
CERGS at LIU promotes research by supporting faculty and students, managing grants, ensuring regulatory compliance, and enhancing the university's research culture.

Can you list the academic positions available for faculty at LIU?
There are five faculty ranks at LIU: Instructor, Lecturer, Assistant Professor, Associate Professor, and Professor. Each of these exists in both Clinical and Non-Clinical tracks.

What's the credit requirement for completing a BS in Computer Engineering at LIU?
The Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering at LIU requires a total of 108 credits for graduation.

Summer 2025 registration at LIU starts on May 10, 2025 at 10:00 am.
